about.shortBio: I'm Thiwanka Sandakalum, a passionate Cloud-oriented Software Engineer with expertise in designing and delivering scalable backend systems, distributed microservices, and cloud-native platforms. Based in Colombo, Sri Lanka, I specialize in building secure REST, GraphQL, and gRPC APIs while integrating cutting-edge identity and authentication solutions.
fullBio: My experience spans the full development lifecycle‚Äîfrom architecture and development to deployment, monitoring, and CI/CD automation. I'm particularly skilled in optimizing applications through caching, load balancing, and distributed messaging systems like Redis and RabbitMQ.

I have a proven track record in e-commerce platforms, back-office systems, and AI-powered solutions, consistently delivering measurable improvements in operational efficiency, system scalability, and user experience. Currently working at OTL Colombo, I've contributed to cross-border e-commerce platforms that have achieved 20% faster order processing and fully automated logistics workflows.
